name: bridge
description: Seller-executed cross-chain bridge via LI.FI. Buyer transfers funds to executor (ACP requiredFunds). Supports fromChain and toChain in {ethereum, base, arbitrum, polygon, bsc}. Any token supported via LI.FI DEX+bridge aggregation. Optional toToken for cross-chain swap.

token.description: Source token symbol (e.g. USDC, WETH, USDT, DAI) or contract address.

toToken.description: Destination token symbol on target chain (optional). If omitted, defaults to same as token.

slippage.description: Slippage as decimal (0.005=0.5%) OR percent (0.5=0.5%). Default 0.5%.

dryRun.description: If true, only returns quote/txRequest without broadcasting.
